content: with an airy design ribbed trim and drapey sleeves this breezy cover-up is perfect for spring and summer layer it with your favorite t-shirt dress jean shorts or swimsuit at the beach or pool this lightweight cardigan pattern is my new favourite design and with easy to follow instructions it s perfect for beginner and advanced crocheters alike you can make adult sizes from extra small to 4xl using this pdf pattern please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free on www lakesideloops com in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes **written pattern** **pictures chart video tutorial** left hand pattern available upon request *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
